reasons: matched lyrics; more accurate chorus; refined punctuation
output:
Dance open wide, in and outside, she is gone.
Beyond the last baby breath, one birth, one death, she is you in truth.
Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah
Lest ye forget, be not upset
All you do is approve
Now, these photographs are epitaphs
That remind me
And when she left, she left them all behind
I guess I must just say goodbye now
I hope I got this message through somehow
